features.title: Project Initialization
features.description: Initial project setup with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v3.4.x, shadcn/ui, and Recharts
features.notes: Full tech stack setup per CLAUDE.md specifications

features.title: Standard Gauge types + local JSON file storage
features.description: Implement local JSON persistence (no database) and minimal runtime validation/normalization for Standard Gauge service lines.
features.notes: IDs are sanitized; persistence is server-only; normalization keeps labor_variance and updated_at consistent.

features.title: Unit tests + workflow gate (Vitest)
features.description: Add unit test runner and require tests to pass as part of the standard implementation quality gates.
features.notes: Vitest runs in Node; `server-only` is aliased to a no-op in tests to avoid throwing.

features.title: Iron Horse: editable service line DAG (React Flow)
features.description: Build a React Flow canvas to create/edit service lines: nodes (stations) + edges (tracks), with save/load/import/export.
features.notes: Completed in 7 iterations: view DAG, custom nodes, edit properties, add/delete stations, edge management, save/load, create/import/export.

features.title: Sensors + dashboards (RAG v1)
features.description: Station metric editor, derived rollups, and basic Recharts dashboards; compute and display RAG overlays.
features.notes: Completed in 7 iterations: metric editor, RAG computation, edge styling, rollups, dashboard, variance chart, QA chart.

features.title: Synthetic data generator + sandbox simulation
features.description: Generate realistic mock station metrics and add scenario sliders to stress-test service lines; allow save/compare scenarios locally.
features.notes: Completed in 5 iterations: synthetic generator, scenario sliders, in-memory apply, save/restore, dashboard toggle. Includes shared station catalog, per-station overrides, scenario name display. Session 2025-12-30: Added edge weights display, pathfinder panel, admin stations dashboard, description field, duplicate button, and fixed per-SL hour allocation data model.

backlog.title: Dispatcher v1 (rule-based reports + alerts)
backlog.description: Generate deterministic dispatcher reports and global alerts from current JSON state; AI integration comes later.
backlog.notes: AI integration explicitly deferred; keep alerts decoupled and derived at runtime.

backlog.title: Entity Registry
backlog.description: Add Entity concept to model multiple business units (Radio, eCayTrade, News). Includes entity types, touchpoints, and CRUD API. Foundation for cross-entity attribution.
backlog.notes: Part of 2026 Multiplex Network vision. Enables Option B (dashboard-based attribution).

backlog.title: Attribution Data Model + Snapshots API
backlog.description: Add AttributionEdge, JourneySnapshot, and GapOpportunity types. Create /api/attribution/snapshots endpoint for storing/retrieving periodic cross-entity flow data.
backlog.notes: Snapshots are aggregated (weekly/monthly), not real-time. Separate from operational ServiceLine data.

backlog.title: Attribution Sankey Dashboard
backlog.description: Build /dashboard/attribution page with Recharts Sankey diagram showing user flow across entities. Include period selector and entity filters.
backlog.notes: Uses Recharts Sankey component. Visualizes cross-entity conversion paths.

backlog.title: Gap Analysis Engine
backlog.description: Compute demand vs supply gaps from touchpoint data. Display gap opportunity cards on attribution dashboard with recommended actions.
backlog.notes: Identifies high-demand, low-supply opportunities (e.g., 500 searches, 10 listings). Feeds into Sales Engine targeting.

backlog.title: Centrality Computation (Graph Analytics)
backlog.description: Add betweenness and closeness centrality algorithms to identify highest-value touchpoints ('biggest bridge'). Display on attribution dashboard.
backlog.notes: Graph theory metrics to quantify which assets drive the most cross-entity conversions.
